text: Thanks Barry, we were able to determine the issue and resolve it last Thursday evening. We appreciate you reporting the issue.
the default content or the page content?
If it's a global module you can click the big black button to edit the content. Other wise you have to edit the fields in the module

Hello everyone!!! I am facing few issues while using multiple forms in my template...I have created Layouts of mega menu in a global module where I have given choices to show form,image and menu-links. If i choose form in the first layout and try choosing form in the second layout also...The first form gets loaded not the second one..The second one has the same id as that of the first one..hence creating an empty div..I have attached screenshots of it for your reference....Can you please check?
Hello <@U38EZFVFE> what if I want to change the default content of modules in dnd?
